snippet: A weekend standstill involving 10,000 vehicles between Moscow and St. Petersburg refocused attention on the state of Soviet-era infrastructure.
abstract: Senior Russian officials are forced to go on television to mollify thousands of angry drivers after first snowfall of year causes massive traffic jam between Moscow and St Petersburg that trapped some motorists for three days.
lead_paragraph: A weekend standstill involving 10,000 vehicles between Moscow and St. Petersburg refocused attention on the state of Soviet-era infrastructure.

headline.seo: Russian Traffic Jam Strands Drivers for 3 Days
headline.main: Neglect Catches Up to Russians in Three-Day Traffic Jam
headline.print_headline: Neglect Catches Up to Russians in Three-Day Traffic Jam
